pr_title: TSK-1105 Make attributes in ClassificationResource private

timeline.bodyText:
Pls use AssertJ for this and future tests. If the dependency is not already added, add it like this to the corresponding
pom.xml:
<dependency>
<groupId>org.assertj</groupId>
<artifactId>assertj-core</artifactId>
<version>${version.assertj}</version>
<scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
Then you can import the static assertthat...() methods
timeline.author: gitgoodjhe

timeline.message:
TSK-1105 Make attributes in ClassificationResource private

TSK-1105 Converted tests to AssertJ
